name: Bench Press
description: Upper body exercise targeting the chest, arms, and shoulders with a barbell.

name: Squat
description: Full body exercise using a barbell to strengthen the legs and buttocks.

name: Deadlift
description: Weight lifting exercise with a barbell focusing on the hips and lower back.

name: Push-Up
description: Bodyweight exercise for chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Pull-Up
description: Bodyweight exercise for back and biceps using a pull-up bar.

name: Plank
description: Core-strengthening exercise holding a push-up position on your elbows.

name: Lunges
description: Leg exercise involving stepping forward and bending both knees.

name: Dumbbell Curl
description: Isolation exercise for biceps using dumbbells.

name: Russian Twists
description: Core exercise involving twisting the torso with a weight or ball.

name: Tricep Dips
description: Exercise to target the triceps using parallel bars or a bench.

name: Calf Raises
description: Exercise for the calf muscles using weights or a machine.

name: Leg Press
description: Leg exercise using a leg press machine.

name: Shoulder Press
description: Shoulder exercise with a barbell or dumbbells.

name: Hammer Curls
description: Biceps exercise with a hammer grip using dumbbells.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: Cardio and core exercise performed in a plank position.

name: Bent-Over Rows
description: Back exercise with a barbell or dumbbells.

name: Bicep Curls
description: Isolation exercise for biceps with dumbbells.

name: Sit-Ups
description: Core exercise to strengthen abdominal muscles.

name: Leg Curls
description: Hamstring exercise using a leg curl machine.

name: Chin-Ups
description: Back and biceps exercise with an underhand grip on a pull-up bar.

name: Plank Rotations
description: Core exercise involving twisting in a plank position with a weight or ball.
